title: Rename app on welcome/login page and enable subject edit/delete in question bank

requirements.text: On the Login/welcome page (frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx), update any displayed app name or branding text that reads 'Exam Craft' to 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System'.

quotes: change name exam craft on welcome page as Automatic Question Ppaper Generation System

acceptanceCriteria: The Login page no longer shows 'Exam Craft' anywhere.
The Login page displays 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System' as the app name/branding.

requirements.text: In the Question Bank page (frontend/src/pages/QuestionBank.tsx), within the Subjects tab, render each subject entry with an Edit button and a Delete button. Clicking Edit should open an edit dialog (reuse or extend SubjectManager's edit dialog) pre-filled with the subject's current name. Clicking Delete should prompt for confirmation and then delete the subject via the existing delete mutation in useQueries.ts.

quotes: in question bank section allow edit and delete subject

acceptanceCriteria: Each subject listed in the Subjects tab of the Question Bank has a visible Edit button and a Delete button.
Clicking Edit opens a dialog pre-filled with the subject's current name; saving the form updates the subject.
Clicking Delete shows a confirmation prompt; confirming removes the subject from the list.
After editing or deleting, the subject list refreshes to reflect the updated state.

constraints: Do not modify any file under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths).
Do not alter the existing backend schema or data model.
nonGoals: Changing the app name in any page other than the Login/welcome page.
Adding or editing questions from the Subjects tab.
Any changes to the question edit/delete functionality (already exists).
